about_the_game: This demo includes the tutorial section of the full game, as well as a sample of some more challenging levels.
detailed_description: This demo includes the tutorial section of the full game, as well as a sample of some more challenging levels.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Java-supported distro
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 45 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Java 7 or higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 45 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Java 7 or higher

name: Prompt Demo

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1

  • Additional Notes: Java 7 or higher
